summary: IN JUNE OF 1999 THE CONSUMER RECEIVED A NOTICE FROM THE MANUFACTURER THAT HER VEHICLES ENGINE MAY DEVELOP A CRACK AND THEY WOULD COVER THE VEHICLE FOR A SPECIFIED AMOUNT OF TIME OR MILEAGE.  NOW THE TIME AND MILEAGE HAS EXPIRED AND THE VEHICLE HAS  DEVELOPED THIS PROBLEM.  THE MANUFACTURER DOES NOT WANT TO HELP THE CONSUMER WITH THE PROBLEM.     *NLM
